attributes.action: Set up a data base of those convicted of racial hatred towards players.
attributes.additional_details: Make it law that anyone on the data base is banned from football matches for life and that any tickets already purchased by the perpetrators are voided without refund. I believe this is the only way that the message is going to get across that racism in football will not be tolerated and that the perpetrators will be stamped  down on hard.
attributes.background: Set up a database with names of those convicted of racial hate towards football players so that they can be banned from games for life and that database can be accessed by clubs and law enforcement.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591817
